description: Adds a specified number of users and bots to a channel.

parameters.name: ChannelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel to which you're adding users or bots.

parameters.name: MemberArns
parameters.description: The ARNs of the members you want to add to the channel. Only AppInstanceUsers and AppInstanceBots can be added as a channel member. (string) ---

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

parameters.name: SubChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the request.

nested_items.name: BatchChannelMemberships
nested_items.description: The list of channel memberships in the response.

nested_items.name: InvitedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier of the member who invited another member.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The membership types set for the channel members.

nested_items.name: Members
nested_items.description: The users successfully added to the request.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel to which you're adding members.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: If the action fails for one or more of the memberships in the request, a list of the memberships is returned, along with error codes and error messages.

nested_items.name: MemberArn
nested_items.description: The AppInstanceUserArn of the member that the service couldn't add.
